page.title: 07ASTRO SPORTS CLUB WADDINGTON
page.content: In lower Waddington there is a modern club called the Astro Club. It is the most popular club in Waddington. More than 1000 people go in a week to drink, play sports or go on the sunbed.The sports include pool, snooker, squash, gymnastics, and tennis. There are three courts for playing squash. The owners would like a swimming pool but they cannot because the land they own is too small. Downstairs there is a restaurant and a bar. On Monday, Tuesday and Wednesday the club is open 12 hours a day and on Thursday, Friday and Saturday it is open 15 hours. On Thursday, Friday and Saturday there is a disco each night. Membership of the Club costs Â£89 a year and although children cannot join they are allowed in the club with their parents.
